description: DC operating point golden data for BJT circuits (Ebers-Moll model)

circuits.name: npn_common_emitter
circuits.description: NPN common-emitter amplifier in forward active region
circuits.netlist:
NPN Common Emitter
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 10
VB 3 0 DC 0.7
RC 1 2 1k
Q1 2 3 0 QMOD
.end

circuits.name: npn_cutoff
circuits.description: NPN transistor in cutoff (both junctions reverse biased)
circuits.netlist:
NPN Cutoff
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 10
VB 3 0 DC 0
RC 1 2 1k
Q1 2 3 0 QMOD
.end

analysis.notes: With Vbe=0, BJT is in cutoff, Ic≈0, V(2)=VCC

circuits.name: npn_voltage_divider_bias
circuits.description: NPN with voltage divider bias network
circuits.netlist:
NPN Voltage Divider Bias
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 12
RB1 1 3 10k
RB2 3 0 2k
RC 1 2 1k
RE 4 0 100
Q1 2 3 4 QMOD
.end

analysis.notes: Stiff divider sets V(3)≈2V, Vbe≈0.7V, Ve≈1.3V, Ie≈13mA

circuits.name: npn_emitter_follower
circuits.netlist:
NPN Emitter Follower
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 10
VIN 2 0 DC 5
Q1 1 2 3 QMOD
RE 3 0 1k
.end

analysis.notes: Emitter follows base minus Vbe drop: V(3)≈V(2)-0.7

circuits.name: pnp_common_emitter
circuits.netlist:
PNP Common Emitter
.MODEL PMOD PNP (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VEE 1 0 DC -10
VB 3 0 DC -0.7
RC 1 2 1k
Q1 2 3 0 PMOD
.end

analysis.notes: PNP mirror of NPN: currents flow from emitter to collector

circuits.name: npn_with_early_effect
circuits.netlist:
NPN Early Effect
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100 VAF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 10
VB 3 0 DC 0.65
RC 1 2 1k
Q1 2 3 0 QMOD
.end

analysis.notes: Early effect causes Ic to depend slightly on Vce

circuits.name: npn_saturation
circuits.netlist:
NPN Saturation
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 5
VB 4 0 DC 3
RB 4 3 10k
RC 1 2 100
Q1 2 3 0 QMOD
.end

analysis.notes: High base drive saturates BJT: Vce≈0.2V (Vce,sat)

circuits.name: npn_current_source
circuits.netlist:
NPN Current Source
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 15
VB 3 0 DC 1.7
RL 1 2 2k
RE 4 0 1k
Q1 2 3 4 QMOD
.end

circuits.name: npn_differential_pair_balanced
circuits.netlist:
NPN Diff Pair
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 10
VIN 5 0 DC 0
RC1 1 2 5k
RC2 1 3 5k
Q1 2 5 4 QMOD
Q2 3 0 4 QMOD
REE 4 6 10k
VEE 6 0 DC -10
.end

analysis.notes: With balanced inputs, V(2)=V(3), tail current splits equally

circuits.name: npn_current_mirror
circuits.description: Basic NPN current mirror with 1mA reference
circuits.netlist:
NPN Current Mirror
.MODEL QMOD NPN (IS=1e-15 BF=100)
VCC 1 0 DC 10
RREF 1 2 9.3k
Q1 2 2 0 QMOD
Q2 3 2 0 QMOD
RL 1 3 5k
.end

analysis.notes: Q1 sets Vbe, Q2 mirrors Iref≈1mA. V(3)=VCC-Ic*RL=10-1mA*5k=5V
